title: "Squeeze for your assistant" feature has disappeared after updates.
content:
My Active Edge is on however when I go to Settings > System > Gestures >Active Edge, the only features I can see are "Squeeze sensitivity" and "Squeeze for silence" .  These two features work as expected.

 However the feature "Squeeze for your assistant" has now completely disappeared! Where as it was there before. I had it turned on and was using this feature for over two weeks. Now it is gone.

Does anyone know How I can get back the ""Squeeze for your assistant"" feature?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
